LanguageData.Ship_Beam.label: ship structural beam
LanguageData.Ship_Beam.description: A structural beam around which a ship can be constructed.
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepPod.label: ship cryptosleep pod
LanguageData.Ship_CryptosleepPod.description: A cryptosleep pod hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.label: ship computer core
LanguageData.Ship_ComputerCore.description: A computer core capable of housing a superhumanoid AI who can guide a ship through any challenge.
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.label: ship reactor
LanguageData.Ship_Reactor.description: Powers a ship on its journey through space.
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.label: ship engine
LanguageData.Ship_Engine.description: An antimatter-powered engine capable of launching a ship into orbit and on interstellar trajectories.
